                                  ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)

        client - The client parameter is an instance of the ConnectionToClient class, which represents a connection to a client in a client-server communication.

      • ImportTwoLectuerGrades

        public void ImportTwoLectuerGrades​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> requestParam,
                                   ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        This function retrieves grades data from a database for two different lecturer IDs and sends it to a client.
        Parameters:
        requestParam - An ArrayList of Strings containing two elements, representing the IDs of two lecturers.
        client - The "client" parameter is an object of type ConnectionToClient, which represents the client that is connected to the server and will receive the response.

      • getRequestTimeInfo

        public void getRequestTimeInfo​(logic.RequestTime requestTime,
                               ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        This function retrieves information about extra time requests from a MySQL database and sends it to a client.
        Parameters:
        requestTime - An object of the class RequestTime, which contains information about a request for extra time for an exam.
        client - The client parameter is an instance of the ConnectionToClient class, which represents the connection between the server and a specific client. It is used to send responses back to the client.

      • searchExam

        public void searchExam​(logic.Request rq,
                       ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        This function searches for a specific exam request and either approves or rejects it, updating the exam time and sending a response to the client accordingly.
        Parameters:
        rq - A Request object that contains the exam ID and the request type (approve or reject).
        client - The client parameter is an instance of the ConnectionToClient class, which represents a connection to a client in a client-server communication system.

      • importStudentData

        public void importStudentData​(java.lang.String gID,
                              ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.sql.SQLException
        This function retrieves student data from a MySQL database and sends it to a client, either for all students or for a specific student ID.
        Parameters:
        gID - gID is a String parameter that represents the student ID. If it is null, the method retrieves all the grades from the database. If it is not null, the method retrieves only the grades of the student with the given ID.
        client - The parameter "client" is of type ConnectionToClient, which represents a connection to a client in a client-server architecture. It is used to send data back to the client.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • importStudentDataTenths

        public void importStudentDataTenths​(java.lang.String gID,
                                    ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.sql.SQLException
        This Java function retrieves student grades data from a MySQL database and sends it to a client, either for all students or for a specific student ID.
        Parameters:
        gID - gID is a String parameter that represents the ID of a student. If it is null, the method retrieves grades for all students. If it is not null, the method retrieves grades only for the student with the specified ID.
        client - The "client" parameter is an object of type "ConnectionToClient", which represents a connection to a client in a client-server communication system.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • importLectuerData

        public void importLectuerData​(java.lang.String gID,
                              ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.sql.SQLException
        This Java function imports grades data from a MySQL database based on a given lecturer ID and sends it to a client.
        Parameters:
        gID - gID is a String parameter representing the ID of a lecturer. It is used to filter the results of the SQL query to only include grades that were given by that specific lecturer. If gID is null, then all grades are returned.
        client - The parameter "client" is of type ConnectionToClient, which is a class representing a connection to a client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • importLectuerDataTenths

        public void importLectuerDataTenths​(java.lang.String gID,
                                    ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.sql.SQLException
        This Java function retrieves grades data from a MySQL database based on a lecturer ID and sends it to a client.
        Parameters:
        gID - gID is a String parameter that represents the ID of a lecturer. It is used to filter the results of the SQL query to retrieve only the grades that belong to the specified lecturer. If gID is null, then all grades are retrieved.
        client - The "client" parameter is an object of type "ConnectionToClient", which represents a connection to a client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • importCourseData

        public void importCourseData​(java.lang.String gID,
                             ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This Java function imports course data from a MySQL database and sends it to a client.
        Parameters:
        gID - gID is a String parameter that represents the course ID for which the grades are being imported. If gID is null, then all grades for all courses will be imported.
        client - The parameter "client" is an object of type ConnectionToClient, which represents a connection to a client.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • importCourseDatatenths

        public void importCourseDatatenths​(java.lang.String gID,
                                   ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This Java function retrieves grades data from a MySQL database for a specific course ID and sends it to a client.
        Parameters:
        gID - gID is a String parameter that represents the course ID for which the grades are being imported.
        client - The parameter "client" is of type ConnectionToClient, which is a class representing a connection to a client in a server-client architecture. It is used to send data to the client.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getCourseId

        public int getCourseId​(java.lang.String courseName,
                       java.sql.Connection conn)
        This Java function retrieves the course ID from a database based on the course name.
        Parameters:
        courseName - A String representing the name of a course.
        conn - The "conn" parameter is a Connection object that represents a connection to a database. It is used to execute SQL statements and retrieve results from the database.
        Returns:
        The method is returning an integer value which represents the course ID of a given course name. If the course name is not found in the database, the method returns -1.

      • getUserInfo

        public logic.Users getUserInfo​(logic.LogInInfo login,
                               java.sql.Connection conn)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        This Java function retrieves user information from a database based on a given login and connection.
        Parameters:
        login - an object of type LogInInfo that contains the username and password of the user trying to log in.
        conn - The "conn" parameter is a Connection object that represents a connection to a database. It is used to execute SQL statements and retrieve results from the database.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a Users object that contains the information of a user with the given username and password. If no user is found with the given credentials, it returns null.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
